source:
TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_SEQ_00Qhoterl Pasol is anxious to share news of a recent discovery.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête avec limitation de job ou de classe
* Il n'est possible de progresser dans cette quête qu'avec la classe qui a servi à la commencer.

Qhoterl Pasol a besoin de matériel de pêche.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested supplies to Qhoterl Pasol.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_SEQ_01<tab>Livrer ce qui vous a été demandé à Qhoterl Pasol

source: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine splendid bone fragments at the Husk)) ((Deliver the splendid bone fragments to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather splendid earthworms at the Husk)) ((Deliver the splendid earthworms to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch a splendid larva at Mjrl's Regret)) ((Deliver the splendid larva to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Extraire <var 33 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> près de La Coquille brisée)) ((Livrer <var 33 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> à Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Récolter <var 33 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> près de La Coquille brisée)) ((Livrer <var 33 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> à Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Harponner <var 33 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> en aval de la Nostalgie de Mjrl)) ((Livrer <var 33 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> à Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Our workers discovered a vast body of water while excavating an underground cave, and found it absolutely teeming with fish. This blessing will provide a steady supply of sustenance as we dig deeper. That is, of course, if we can catch the fish.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Profondeurs des cavernes abriter lac<var 1D /var>! Incroyable incroyable<var 1D /var>! Devoir fournir à explorateuuurs matériel de pêche pour pouvoir manger pendant travail<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>A lure made from animal bones should prove irresistible, and the Husk has no shortage of desiccated remains. My workers and I would be grateful if you could bring some to us.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>Avoir besoin d'os d'animal pour fabriquer canne<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> extraire <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF273600202 /var> de haute qualité près de Coquille brisée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_002<tab>Worms would make ideal bait, but only the most plump and juicy will do. Those in the Husk are fat from feasting on the remains littering the area. My workers and I would be grateful if you would bring us some─for the fish, of course, not for us!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_002<tab>Avoir besoin de vers pour appâter poissons<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> récolter <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF2737A0202 /var> de haute qualité près de Coquille brisée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_003<tab>Fish can't well resist a plump, juicy bug at the end of a hook, but a simple fruit worm won't do if we wish to catch the most succulent fish. However, a fruit worm <var 1A 02 /var>may<var 1A 01 /var> suffice to catch what we need. Go to Mjrl's Regret with fruit worm on hook, and bring us back a splendid larva.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_003<tab>Avoir besoin de larves pour appâter poissons<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> pêcher <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF273940202 /var> avec <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF26BBE0202 /var> en aval de Nostalgie de Mjrl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_004<tab>The fish are certain to go wild for a lure made of animal bone. Make your way to the Husk, and you'll practically trip over what we need.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_004<tab>Avoir besoin d'os d'animal pour fabriquer canne<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> extraire <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF273600202 /var> de haute qualité près de Coquille brisée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_005<tab>We need worms, and lots of them. Big, juicy ones─the type that practically carpet the Husk. I trust you aren't too squeamish to handle them.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_005<tab>Avoir besoin de vers pour appâter poissons<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> récolter <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF2737A0202 /var> de haute qualité près de Coquille brisée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_006<tab>The task is simple: use a bug to catch a bug. Head to Mjrl's Regret, pole in hand and fruit worm on hook, and you should have what we need in no time.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_006<tab>Avoir besoin de larves pour appâter poissons<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> pêcher <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF273940202 /var> avec <var 33 ((Item)) 0DF26BBE0202 /var> en aval de Nostalgie de Mjrl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>Now there's my able gatherer! Well, did you get the items? We're ever so eager to begin feasting.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>Enfants de Qhoterl Pasol déjà vouloir s'essayer à pêche dans cavernes<var 1D /var>! Toi avoir rapporté nécessaire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_011<tab>You've outdone yourself once again! Until now, we've been subsisting on preserved food. It fills our bellies, but I'm of the philosophy that a meal is meant to be savored. Perhaps finally we can forget the fact that we're toiling away under the earth, if even just for one meal.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_QHOTERLPASOL_000_011<tab>Enfants être contents contents<var 1D /var>! Nourriture en conserve perdre goût avec temps, alors pouvoir manger poisson frais chaque jour changer vie<var 1D /var>! Oui oui oui<var 1D /var>!
TEXT_BANQIQ126_03831_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Les objets de qualité normale récoltés au cours de cette quête n'ayant aucune utilité et ne pouvant être vendus, il est recommandé de les jeter.
